Class XMLFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • XMLFile

  • public class XMLFile
extends java.lang.Object
    XML File object that stores all of the data for one XML file
    Author:
    JD Porterfield

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLFile()
      Constructor that does nothing because the XMLFile object is created and then added to as the parser goes along

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addElement(XMLElement node)
      Adds a new top level element to this file
      java.util.ArrayList<XMLElement> getElements()
      Returns the top level elements in this file (which is essentially the whole file)
      java.util.ArrayList<XMLElement> getElementsByTag(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a list of the XMLElements that have the specified tag name
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the String representation of this file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • XMLFile

        public XMLFile()
        Constructor that does nothing because the XMLFile object is created and then added to as the parser goes along

    • Method Detail

      • addElement

        public void addElement(XMLElement node)
        Adds a new top level element to this file
        Parameters:
        node - The element to add

      • getElements

        public java.util.ArrayList<XMLElement> getElements()
        Returns the top level elements in this file (which is essentially the whole file)
        Returns:
        The list of elements

      • getElementsByTag

        public java.util.ArrayList<XMLElement> getElementsByTag(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a list of the XMLElements that have the specified tag name
        Parameters:
        name - the tag to search for
        Returns:
        a list of elements with the matching tag

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the String representation of this file. (I.e. basically the file as it was input)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representing this file
